articles.author: KRISTY INUS
articles.title: Sabah welcomes first international flight since borders closed due to pandemic - The Star Online
articles.description: KOTA KINABALU: AirAsia became the first airline to open up direct international flights to Sabah since Malaysian borders reopened on April 1, with its inaugural Singapore-Kota Kinabalu flight landing on Saturday (April 16).
articles.content: KOTA KINABALU: AirAsia became the first airline to open up direct international flights to Sabah since Malaysian borders reopened on April 1, with its inaugural Singapore-Kota Kinabalu flight landing… [+1787 chars]

articles.author: Gabriel Tan
articles.title: JDT off to a flyer in ACL 2022; Lion City Sailors get reality check being among Asia's elite - ESPN
articles.description: The AFC Champions League 2022 East Zone began on Friday with Johor Darul Ta'zim off to a flyer, while Lion City Sailors were given a reality check.
articles.content:
The group stage in the AFC Champions League 2022's East Zone got underway on Friday evening and there was immediately plenty of thrills and spills.
From two legitimate contenders sharing the spoils … [+4659 chars]
